pageContext.claim: “And what these guys do, and what these guys do if Mr. and Mrs. Jones, sitting right up there, beautiful couple, if she said, ‘Darling, I'm sorry. There's nothing I can do about it, darling. I have to go to the bathroom.’ He said, ‘Darling, I'll walk with you.’ The cameras glove on to those seats, they glove on and they say, ‘There were two empty seats. Trump didn't fill up the room.’”
pageContext.analysis: Trump claims that no one leaves his rallies and that when cameras capture empty seats it's because people stepped away to the restroom. But he sometimes draws a less-than-capacity crowd, and there are numerous examples of rallies where seats and sections were empty.
